message.uploadReferencesExceed.message: You can upload up to 5 images

message.startingTask.description: Message when the drawing task starts

message.usedUp.message: Your credits have been exhausted, please purchase more credits to continue

message.extendVideo.description: Message while the video is being generated

message.uploadVideoExceed.message: The number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit
